entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight and then changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
